successes.title: Motopeds
successes.description: Motoped - a DIY motorized bike kit that you assemble yourself using a XR50/pitbike engine and standard mountain bike components.

Pledges.description: Thank you for the support! Everything counts. :)
A cotton screenprinted "motoped." t-shirt with the motoped logo on it. Free shipping within the US.
Includes Special made Shifter, Linkage, brake pedal- brake linkage, Foot peg mounts and Pegs!
Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. No shipping if you want to pick it up in person to save money.
Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. 599+99 US Domestic shipping
Marzocchi Front Suspension with heavy duty springs made specifically for Motopeds.
Plus Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. No shipping if you want to pick it up in person to save money.
Marzocchi front suspension with heavy springs made specifically for Motopeds.
Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. Includes shipping.

Marzocchi front and rear suspension, both with heavy springs made specifically for Motopeds.. Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. No shipping if you want to pick it up in person to save money.

Marzocchi front and rear suspension, both with heavy springs made specifically for Motopeds. Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. Includes shipping.

Custom Peg Kit. Motoped -PEG Kits! Includes Special made Shifter, Linkage, brake pedal- brake linkage, Foot peg mounts and Pegs! + Marzocchi front and rear suspension, both with heavy springs made specifically for Motopeds. + Motoped Frame kit - includes Frame, Swing-arm, Sub-frame, Jack-shaft assembly, Rear Hub, Sprockets, Exhaust assembly. Includes shipping.
Motoped complete kit includes everything you need to build a Motoped in one day or less minus the motor. No shipping if you want to pick it up in person to save money.
Motoped complete kit includes everything you need to build a Motoped in one day or less minus the motor with shipping.

Motoped complete kit includes everything you need to build a Motoped in one day or less minus the motor. This includes Marzocchi front and rear suspension, both with heavy springs made specifically for Motopeds. Includes shipping.
